thread.title: Housing Development Finance Corp Updates Medium Term Note Programme Through Offering Circular For Up To $2.80 Bln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Housing Development Finance Corp Updates Medium Term Note Programme Through Offering Circular For Up To $2.80 Bln

organizations.name: housing development finance corp updates medium term note programme
reuters) - housing development finance corporation ltd

text:
March 1 (Reuters) - Housing Development Finance Corporation Ltd:
* ON FEB 27, CO UPDATED EXISTING MEDIUM TERM NOTE PROGRAMME THROUGH OFFERING CIRCULAR FOR UP TO $2.80 BILLION
* UPDATE TO ENABLE CO TO ISSUE RUPEE/FOREIGN CURRENCY DENOMINATED BONDS IN INTERNATIONAL CAPITAL MARKETS Source text - bit.ly/2GS6ydR
